 Gets a range of plot data for the given plot and field.
Data Range
(NSRange) - recordIndexRangeForPlot:plotRange:
 Determines the record index range corresponding to a given range of data. This method is optional. If the method is implemented, it could improve performance in data sets that are only partially displayed.
Data Labels
(CPLayer *) - dataLabelForPlot:recordIndex:
 Gets a data label for the given plot. This method is optional.

Detailed Description

A plot data source.

Member Function Documentation

- (CPNumericData *) dataForPlot: (CPPlot *)  plot
field: (NSUInteger)  fieldEnum
recordIndexRange: (NSRange)  indexRange 

Gets a range of plot data for the given plot and field.

Parameters:
plot The plot.
fieldEnum The field index.
indexRange The range of the data indexes of interest.
Returns:
A one-dimensional array of data points.

- (CPLayer *) dataLabelForPlot: (CPPlot *)  plot
recordIndex: (NSUInteger)  index 

Gets a data label for the given plot. This method is optional.

Parameters:
plot The plot.
index The data index of interest.
Returns:
The data label for the point with the given index. If you return nil, the default data label will be used. If you return an instance of NSNull, no label will be shown for the index in question.

- (double) doubleForPlot: (CPPlot *)  plot
field: (NSUInteger)  fieldEnum
recordIndex: (NSUInteger)  index 

Gets a plot data value for the given plot and field.

Parameters:
plot The plot.
fieldEnum The field index.
index The data index of interest.
Returns:
A data point.

- (double *) doublesForPlot: (CPPlot *)  plot

recordIndexRange: (NSRange)  indexRange 

Gets a range of plot data for the given plot and field.

Parameters:
plot The plot.
fieldEnum The field index.
indexRange The range of the data indexes of interest.
Returns:

The number of data points for the plot.

Parameters:

Returns:
The number of data points for the plot.

- (NSArray *) numbersForPlot: (CPPlot *)  plot
field: (NSUInteger)  fieldEnum
recordIndexRange: (NSRange)  indexRange 

Gets a range of plot data for the given plot and field.

Parameters:
plot The plot.
fieldEnum The field index.
indexRange The range of the data indexes of interest.
Returns:
An array of data points.

- (NSRange) recordIndexRangeForPlot: (CPPlot *)  plot
plotRange: (CPPlotRange *)  plotRange 

Determines the record index range corresponding to a given range of data. This method is optional. If the method is implemented, it could improve performance in data sets that are only partially displayed.

Parameters:
plot The plot.
plotRange The range expressed in data values.
Returns:
The range of record indexes.
